app.title: My Expenses AI
settings.title: Personal Settings
settings.profile.complete: Complete your info from the onboarding screen.
settings.profile.avatar_hint: Pick the emoji that represents you best.
settings.profile.name_required: Please enter a valid name before saving.
settings.profile.updated: Your profile info has been updated.
settings.theme.title: Dark mode
settings.theme.subtitle: Switch between light and dark whenever you want.
settings.language.title: Preferred language
settings.language.subtitle: Choose the language you want to use in the app.
settings.currencies.subtitle: Add or edit currencies from a dedicated screen.
settings.currencies.empty_state: You haven't added any currencies yet. Use the add action to configure them.
settings.currencies.empty_list:
No currencies added yet.
Use the button above to pick them.
settings.ai.title: AI insights (Gemini)
settings.ai.subtitle: Enable Gemini-powered analysis for deeper insights when you are online.
settings.ai.status.enabled: AI insights are active and will refresh automatically.
settings.ai.status.disabled: AI insights are currently turned off.
settings.ai.key_missing: Add your Gemini key inside api_keys.dart to activate.
settings.ai.offline_note: Requires an internet connection to generate insights.
settings.reminders.title: Notifications & reminders
settings.reminders.subtitle: Enable local reminders so you never forget to log expenses or review budgets.
settings.reminders.enabled: Local alerts will fire at the scheduled times.
settings.reminders.empty:
No reminders yet.
Use the add button to schedule your first alert.
settings.reminders.delete_confirm: This reminder will be removed permanently. Continue?
settings.reminders.validation: Please write a reminder message before saving.
settings.notifications.center_subtitle: Review every alert generated inside the app.
settings.categories.subtitle: Organize categories from a dedicated screen.
settings.budget.title: Monthly budget
settings.budget.subtitle: Set the default amount you want to track each month.
settings.budget.helper: This value powers the usage indicator inside the insights screen.

transaction.details.title: Transaction details
insights.overview.title: Consolidated monthly overview
insights.ai.title: Smart AI insights
insights.ai.empty: Record your expenses to receive more insights.
insights.ai.disabled: Turn on AI insights from settings to receive Gemini tips.

notifications.center.empty:
No notifications yet.
As soon as we send one it will appear here.
